tables.rationale: Table shows segment revenue breakdown by major product/service categories including Productivity and Business Processes, Intelligent Cloud, and More Personal Computing with data for multiple years, consistent with revenue by product/service offering.
Table provides revenue classified by major geographic areas (United States and Other countries) for multiple years, suitable as revenue by geography.

Table details revenue by specific product and service lines such as Server products and cloud services, Microsoft 365 Commercial products and cloud services, Gaming, LinkedIn, Windows and Devices, Search and news advertising, Dynamics products and cloud services, Enterprise and partner services, and Microsoft 365 Consumer products and cloud services.
